page.title: 19HOME AND COMMUNITY, DEEPCAR
page.content: A{SURVEY}conducted with approx. 100 adults and 150 children in Deepcar provided the following profile: most{ {ADULTS}said the best thing about the area was the countryside.{Problems were: few shops (39%), snow on hills (35%) and few amenities for the young and teenagers(24%). Most common{jobs: steel & engineering. 35% worked away from Sheffield, 24% in Sheffield, 27% locally, 9% retired, 4% unemployed. Favourite{food:}steak; Indian food; Beef, Yorks. Pudding, potato.{CHILDREN preferred fish & chips;37% liked Cola. 27% had 50p-Â£1{pocket money.}65% had a{pet}(esp.dogs,fish). They 'owned' videos(45%), computer(52%), bicycle (78%). Favourite{T.V. programes: "Young Ones","Dallas","Dynasty". Average{bed-time}(7-11 yrs) was 9 p.m. schooldays, 10 p.m. weekends/holidays. 36% were not members of any{clubs.
